items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The cell will alter its appearance in a standard, system-defined way when it becomes focused. This is the default focus style.

items.name: case custom
items.desc: The cell will not alter its appearance automatically when it becomes focused. Specifying this style allows you to create your own custom appearance for the cell. It is recommended that you create custom-looking cells by subclassing UITableViewCell and overriding didUpdateFocus(in:with:).
